title: List of Scottish football championship-winning managers
text:
The following is a list of <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">managers</a> and <a href="Coach%20%28sport%29">head coaches</a> who have won the <a href="List%20of%20Scottish%20football%20champions">Scottish league championship</a>, currently known as the <a href="Scottish%20Premiership">Scottish Premiership</a>.
Some managers have also won the other two major competitions in Scottish football, which are the <a href="Scottish%20Cup">Scottish Cup</a> and the <a href="Scottish%20League%20Cup">Scottish League Cup</a>. This results in a manager winning a "double" (two competitions in one season) or a "treble" (all three in one season). There are also three national lower league championships and a national cup competition for lower league clubs, called the <a href="Scottish%20Challenge%20Cup">Scottish Challenge Cup</a>.
